unnormalised: arre yaar, my electricity bill this month was ₹5500! Last month it was only Rs. 3200. What to do? Called up the helpline, they said maybe usage increased due to the AC running 24/7. Crazy how quickly these bills add up, especially with water bill also being Rs 800 and internet at ₹1200.
normalised: oh my god, my electricity bill this month was rupee five thousand five hundred! Last month it was only rupees three thousand two hundred. What to do? Called up the helpline, they said maybe usage increased due to the A-C running twenty four seven. Crazy how quickly these bills add up, especially with water bill also being rupees eight hundred and internet at rupee one thousand two hundred.
